keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Before her fourth World Cup with the United States, Wambach, 34, chose to leave her N.W.S.L. team, train often on her own and round into form like a boxer for one final bout.

headline.print_headline: Her Resolve? Unbreakable. Her Nose? Well . . .
headline.main: Abby Wambach, Unconcerned With Broken Records or Nose, Craves World Cup Title

snippet: Before her fourth World Cup with the United States, Wambach, 34, chose to leave her N.W.S.L. team, train often on her own and round into form like a boxer for one final bout.
abstract: Profile of American soccer player Abby Wambach, who chose not to play in National Women's Soccer League this season to train for her fourth and final Women's World Cup soccer tournament; Wambach has two Olympic gold medals but no World Cup title.
